scripts.ensure-mlflow: bash -lc 'set -e; export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"; if command -v mlflow >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "MLflow OK"; exit 0; fi; if ! command -v pipx >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "pipx not found. Trying apt..."; if sudo -n true 2>/dev/null; then sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y pipx; else echo "ERROR: pipx 미설치. 실행: sudo apt install -y pipx"; exit 1; fi; fi; pipx ensurepath >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; pipx install mlflow >/dev/null 2>&1 || pipx upgrade mlflow >/dev/null 2>&1; if ! command -v mlflow >/dev/null 2>&1; then export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"; fi; command -v mlflow >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "MLflow installed" || (echo "ERROR: MLflow 설치 실패"; exit 1)'
scripts.dev:all: npm run ensure-mlflow && concurrently "cd ../backend && go run main.go" "npm run dev" "npm run mlflow:ui"
